Uses of Package
sgware.serialsoc

  • Classes in sgware.serialsoc used by sgware.serialsoc
    Class
    Description
    CheckedRunnable
    A functional interface similar with Runnable, except that it declares a checked exception, and similar to Callable except that it returns void.
    SerialServerSocket
    A wrapper around ServerSocket that accepts new SerialSockets and ensures all events happen on the same thread.
    SerialSocket
    A wrapper around Socket that listens for lines of input and ensures all events happen on the same thread.
